Dear Sir,

I need to get FFT of my mp3 file. I need to get the amplitude at a ceratain frequency. Can you please supply me with your code about how to implement FFT.
Thanks for support.
do you know display raw float data in to a waveViewer1?

waveViewer displays waveforms, not FFTs. It's a very simple control, and will probably be removed from NAudio. For visualizations of FFTs, have a look at the demo in the WPF Demo source code. Also, if you are a Pluralsight subscriber I explain in detail how audio can be visualised in Module 7 of this course: http://pluralsight.com/training/Courses/TableOfContents/audio-programming-naudio
